#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define gcd __gcd
#define D 1000000000
#define get(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define getl(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define print(x) printf("%d ",x)
#define printl(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
typedef long long ll;
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t; get(t);
    while(t--)
    {
        string s; cin >> s;
        int n=s.length(),i,j,ans=0;
        for(i=0;i<n-1;i++)
        {
            if(s[i]==s[i+1])
                ans++;
        }
        cout << ans << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
